description: Details of contaminated land in pursuant to condition 4 of planning application reference 160371FUL dated 24/03/2016 for 'Construction of a three storey industrial unit to be used for light industrial use and product/process research and development with ancillary offices and storage (B1(a)(b) and (c) use classes)(following demolition of existing buildings)', varied under planning application reference 171072VAR dated 28/04/2017 for 'Application for a minor material amendment (s73) to vary Condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref. 160371FUL dated 24/03/2016 for Construction of a three storey industrial unit to be used for light industrial use and product/process research and development with ancillary offices and storage (B1(a)(b) and (c) use classes)(following demolition of existing buildings) (Minor material amendment involves construction of basement)'.
